original_text: Elisha went to Damascus, and Ben-Hadad king of Aram was ill. When the king was told, “The man of God has come all the way up here,”
korean_text: 엘리사가 다메섹에 갔을 때에 아람 왕 벤하닷이 병들었더니 왕에게 들리기를 이르되 하나님의 사람이 여기 이르렀나이다 하니

sentences.original_text: and Ben-Hadad king of Aram was ill
The man of God has come all the way up here
